meanings.sent1: She can outread her classmates easily.
meanings.sent2: He always tries to outread his personal best.
meanings.sent3: The bookworm decided to outread the library.
meanings.sent4: Her love for reading outreads all others.
meanings.sent5: His determination to outread is truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: To read more than someone else.
meanings.sent1: I will outread you in the next reading challenge.
meanings.sent2: They outread each other to finish the book first.
meanings.sent3: The siblings playfully compete to outread each other.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for books allows her to outread everyone.
meanings.sent5: He aims to outread all his friends this summer.
